name: Running of the Bulb (Wannibe World remix)
name_original: Running of the Bulb (Wannibe World remix)
description:
Help these fearless undead sisters slaughter monsters and avoid obstacles to get the lightbulb to its goal in this twisted remake of Mario Party 64's Running of the Bulb!

Recommended to play with two players in fullscreen mode. You can sacrifice one of the girls and play single-player mode tho lol (not as fun :P)

Objective

Bring the lightbulb to the goal to win. Shoot infected players to bring them back. If the player holding the bulb dies, GAME OVER! Monsters are attracted to the bulb and will go after it. 

Controls

Player 1 (Keyboard + mouse):

          WASD - Move

          Right Click - Shoot

          E - Drop Bulb

Player 2 (controller): 

          Left Joystick - Move

          A - Shoot

          X - Drop Bulb

 The game in general is kinda janky as I scrambled to whip it together, sorry for the weird collisions and weird main menu T.T And lack of controls in game lol!

Music credits to the talented Oathr: https://soundcloud.com/oathr-vgm

Remember this game?

This is it now xD
